title: Netflix Co-Founder Marc Randolph
itunes:title: Netflix Co-Founder Marc Randolph
description:
When Netflix execs Marc Randolph and Reed Hastings met with Blockbuster brass in 2000, they wanted to sell for $50 million. Blockbuster all but laughed them out of the room.
 
Netflix is a giant American media-services provider and production company headquartered in Los Gatos, California, founded in 1997 by Marc Randolph and Reed Hastings in Scotts Valley, California.
 
And they put Blockbuster out of business. Underdog shit.
 
In this interview, we talk about innovation, staying ahead of market trends, and being resourceful when you’re the little guy on the block.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/marc-randolph/
